name: A small dark grey band
data: It increases the users strength unnoticably.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unnoticably.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
